name: VICO 3: TALE OF THE SEVEN SEAS
name_original: VICO 3: TALE OF THE SEVEN SEAS
description:
VICO 3: Tale of the Seven Seas is an ARCADE game that revolves around "Spherical Game-play". What makes "VICO" different from other Spherical games, is the ability to see through the WATER. This adds an extra level of depth to the game, making "VICO" a truly unique Game-play experience.

Each level gets harder and harder. In order to collect the most amount of points you need to save all three of VICO's children. Each child that is saved earns you a 1,000 points.

- Featuring HD graphics
- Real Time reflections
- Unique Gameplay
- 7 unique worlds
- Numerous enemies
- A fun and exciting Soundtrack
- Unique "Spherical Gameplay" featuring Water
